Detailed Description

Basic types used for DRM.

Definition in file BasicTypes.h.

Define Documentation

#define EVENT_WAIT_TIME   10000
 

Default wait time for event waiting routines.

This is the time spent in waiting for events that are externally dependent, such as waiting for communication response or similar. To prevent infinite waiting and possible external problem, we set timeouts to these values.
